name: P521.Signing.ECDSASignature
desc: A P-521 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature.

items.name: init<D>(derRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a P-512 digital signature from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 digital signature from a raw representation.

items.name: var derRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of a P-521 digital signature.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A raw data representation of a P-521 digital signature.

items.name: func withUnsafeBytes<R>((UnsafeRawBufferPointer) -> R) -> R
items.desc: Invokes the given closure with a buffer pointer covering the raw bytes of the signature.
